person.name: Dheeraj Kumar Shukla
experienceSummary: End-to-end ownership from requirement gathering to production support
Technical SPOC for enterprise clients and OEMs
Hands-on architect with strong delivery focus
person.summary: Senior Technical Architect with 14+ years of experience in the IT software industry, including 8+ years in .NET Core and microservices architecture. Proven expertise in designing and scaling enterprise-grade, cloud-native platforms across EV charging, IoT, vending, and ERP domains. Specialized in Azure/AWS, CI/CD automation, distributed systems, and EV standards such as OCPI and OCPP.

experience.title: Technical Architect
responsibilities: Architect and technical owner of enterprise-scale EV charging platforms.
Led OCPI-compliant integrations between EMSPs and CPOs.
Designed cloud-native microservices using .NET Core, Azure, API Gateway, MySQL, MQTT, RabbitMQ.
Maintained ~99% platform uptime through resilient system design.
Conducted audits and compliance checks for OCPI standards.
Technical SPOC for Hyundai, Mahindra, Tata, Adani, Hero MotoCorp and multiple EMSPs/CPOs.

experience.title: Web Architect
responsibilities: Architected smart vending, visi-cooler, and ERP platforms.
Designed microservices handling millions of daily transactions.
Led SAP and third-party ERP integrations.
Mentored teams and enforced architecture standards.

experience.title: Team Lead
responsibilities: Handled estimations, sprint planning, and deliveries.
Implemented CI/CD pipelines and release automation.

experience.title: Web Developer
responsibilities: Developed enterprise web applications using ASP.NET and SQL Server.
Worked on REST APIs, workflows, and database optimization.

projects.name: ElectreeFi EV Platform
projects.description: OCPI-based EV charging ecosystem enabling interoperability between EMSPs and CPOs across India.

projects.name: Vendiman Vending Platform
projects.description: Smart vending platform with 2000+ machines and 1M+ daily outreach.

projects.name: Gobbly Visi Cooler Platform
projects.description: Smart visi-cooler ecosystem for buyers and sellers.

projects.name: Xtend Sales ERP
projects.description: Offline-first van sales and delivery ERP with route optimization and SAP integration.

education: Master of Computer Applications (MCA) – Asian International University
Bachelor of Computer Applications (BCA) – IGNOU (MNNIT Allahabad)
